text: Thomas Howard "Tom" Stevens (September 17, 1956 - January 24, 2021) was an American pop rock bassist, guitarist and singer-songwriter. He played with the Paisley Underground and the Long Ryders. He was a member of Magi and Danny & Dusty. He was born in Elkhart, Indiana. Stevens died on January 24, 2021 at the age of 64.The Long Ryders ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American pop singers Category:American pop musicians Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:American bass guitarists Category:Musicians from Indiana Category:Singers from Indiana Category:Writers from Indiana Category:American singer-songwriters Category:People from Elkhart, Indiana
title: Tom Stevens (musician)
